body:
The cover of the artist's next SAO book. It will be a Leafa (Suguha) book.
https://twitter.com/narumi_y/status/1340278943610335232
this is just painful and depressing..honestly...
These stories always butcher the characters... :/ To the point that why even use the characters when they clearly aren't them. Terrible story-writing. Well, what else can be expected from NTR...
poor grammar is the best tag so far

The artist has started drawing his next SAO book: https://twitter.com/narumi_y/status/1301086704736980992
However, the artist said he/she is going to draw a Suguha book and he/she is still not sure about drawing a genderbent Kirito book: https://twitter.com/narumi_y/status/1291734190833065984
Why NTRs have always better art than other doujinshis 😢
I ain't a fan of rape but the art's cool

So it's SAO so I wasn't expecting much but seeing as this edgy mf losses and gets his gf and friends raped and mind broken is nice. It's a concept that I never saw before having mind broken character tell a story about how they got raped. Sucks that others got only 1 page. I personally would like to see more of them and less of jerking of Kirito. Translation was okay but there are some typos and "master-sama" really? Okay maybe I'm too picky but it's an okay doujin I would give it 6/10
I want to spread all my seed in Asuna's belly too
